mapper.sql: DISTINCT ifnull(en.EP_NAME,'') AS prodEpName ,ifnull(C.BRAND_NAME,'') AS brandEpName ,ifnull(cla.CLASSES_NAME,'') AS pdClassesName ,IFNULL(mac.MACHINING_NAME,'') AS machiningName ,IFNULL(bre.BREED_NAME,'') AS pdBreedName ,IFNULL(fea.FEATURE_NAME,'') AS pdFeatureName ,IFNULL(wei.WEIGHT_NAME,'') AS weightName ,A.SL_CODE AS slCode ,A.SL_PD_ID AS slPdId ,sta.STANDARD_ID AS standardId ,CONCAT(cla.CLASSES_CODE,mac.MACHINING_CODE,bre.BREED_CODE,fea.FEATURE_CODE,wei.WEIGHT_CODE) AS classestreeCode
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM SL_PRODUCT AS A LEFT JOIN sl_seller AS B ON A.SL_CODE = B.SL_CODE LEFT JOIN sl_enterprise AS en ON B.EP_ID = en.EP_ID LEFT JOIN sl_pd_brand AS C ON A.SL_CODE = C.SL_CODE AND B.SL_CODE = C.SL_CODE AND A.BRAND_EP_ID = C.BRAND_EP_ID AND A.BRAND_ID = C.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN pd_classes AS cla ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = cla.CLASSES_CODE LEFT JOIN pd_MACHINING AS mac ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = mac.CLASSES_CODE AND A.MACHINING_CODE = mac.MACHINING_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_BREED AS bre ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = bre.CLASSES_CODE AND A.MACHINING_CODE = bre.MACHINING_CODE AND A.PD_BREED_CODE = bre.BREED_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_FEATURE AS fea ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = fea.CLASSES_CODE AND A.MACHINING_CODE = fea.MACHINING_CODE AND A.PD_BREED_CODE = fea.BREED_CODE AND A.PD_FEATURE_CODE = fea.FEATURE_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_WEIGHT AS wei ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = wei.CLASSES_CODE AND A.MACHINING_CODE = wei.MACHINING_CODE AND A.PD_BREED_CODE = wei.BREED_CODE AND A.PD_FEATURE_CODE = wei.FEATURE_CODE AND A.WEIGHT_CODE = wei.WEIGHT_CODE LEFT JOIN Pd_STANDARD AS sta ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = sta.CLASSES_CODE AND A.MACHINING_CODE = sta.MACHINING_CODE AND A.PD_BREED_CODE = sta.BREED_CODE AND sta.CLASSESTREE_CODE = CONCAT(A.PD_CLASSES_CODE, A.MACHINING_CODE,A.PD_BREED_CODE)
ORDER BY A.SL_CODE
LIMIT #{startPos},#{pageSize};

SELECT count(1) FROM SL_PRODUCT AS A LEFT JOIN sl_seller AS B ON A.SL_CODE = B.SL_CODE LEFT JOIN sl_enterprise AS en ON B.EP_ID = en.EP_ID LEFT JOIN sl_pd_brand AS C ON A.SL_CODE = C.SL_CODE AND B.SL_CODE = C.SL_CODE AND A.BRAND_EP_ID = C.BRAND_EP_ID AND A.BRAND_ID = C.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN pd_classes AS cla ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = cla.CLASSES_CODE LEFT JOIN pd_MACHINING AS mac ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = mac.CLASSES_CODE AND A.MACHINING_CODE = mac.MACHINING_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_BREED AS bre ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = bre.CLASSES_CODE AND A.MACHINING_CODE = bre.MACHINING_CODE AND A.PD_BREED_CODE = bre.BREED_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_FEATURE AS fea ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = fea.CLASSES_CODE AND A.MACHINING_CODE = fea.MACHINING_CODE AND A.PD_BREED_CODE = fea.BREED_CODE AND A.PD_FEATURE_CODE = fea.FEATURE_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_WEIGHT AS wei ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = wei.CLASSES_CODE AND A.MACHINING_CODE = wei.MACHINING_CODE AND A.PD_BREED_CODE = wei.BREED_CODE AND A.PD_FEATURE_CODE = wei.FEATURE_CODE AND A.WEIGHT_CODE = wei.WEIGHT_CODE LEFT JOIN Pd_STANDARD AS sta ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = sta.CLASSES_CODE AND A.MACHINING_CODE = sta.MACHINING_CODE AND A.PD_BREED_CODE = sta.BREED_CODE AND sta.CLASSESTREE_CODE = CONCAT(A.PD_CLASSES_CODE, A.MACHINING_CODE,A.PD_BREED_CODE)
